# About this {-}

Whether you’re an R user looking to learn Python, a Python user looking to learn R, or simply looking for a comprehensive source to learn both languages, this book is for you!

With “R and PYTHON: WE ARE BILINGUAL,” you’ll gain a thorough understanding of both R and/or Python and learn how to use them together to solve complex problems.
